name: Wacky Burgers
description:
Become a waiter at Wacky Burgers.
You'll be greeted by "look-alike" animals, robbers, zombies... and all sorts of other customers.
This is an innovative point-and-click game with hand-drawn art.

Serve food quickly

.
Quickly select the food ordered before the restaurant's reputation drops to zero.
When you're not sure what to order, your instincts will come into play!
You may have to deal with garbage and insects... and you may have to work on your aiming skills.

Extreme service!

.
For a variety of customers, Wacky Burgers offers an action-packed service.
Greetings, shotguns, strong winds, drops... we are flexible and respond with the best service.

Make lots of money

.
As you reach your sales goals, your clientele and services will increase.
Expand your business with the money you earn! You can earn even more money.
